alert.note: Alert for Christian; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:09PM EST until February 18 at 3:06AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville -68/80 affecting Trigg and Christian Counties. .Heavy rainfall today has caused the Little River at Hopkinsville on 68/80 to rise above flood stage. The river should crest and fall back below flood stage this evening. For the Little River...including Hopkinsville - 68/80, Hopkinsville - Bypass...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville - 68/80. * WHEN...This evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 15.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 15.7 feet, then fall below flood stage before midnight. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1200 AM CST.
